content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the kaunas district court the court resolved a matrimonial property case and decided to dissolve the marriage between the parties involved the defendant was awarded an audi a6 avant and an opel signum while the applicant was awarded an audi a3 and a ford galaxy the court considered the division of property between spouses in a community property system as outlined in the civil code the applicant filed a court claim to dissolve the marriage and requested the establishment of the residence of their minor child as well as child maintenance both parties requested the division of property acquired since august 2019 the court upheld the action and granted a divorce to the applicant and the defendant the court divided the matrimonial property awarding specific vehicles to each party the defendant was ordered to pay a stamp duty and both parties were responsible for paying court fees
